title: Chris Hughes' edits Instagram comment as ex Olivia Attwood announces engagement

However you try to dress it up, your ex getting engaged is never an easy thing to digest.

Olivia Attwood said yes after footballer boyfriend Bradley Dack popped the question this weekend.

The Love Island star announced they are going to get married on social media - and former lover Chris Hughes has also been posting.

He uploaded a topless shot on a beach with an odd comment, before editing it a little later.

Chris originally put: "When it rains, it pours, but soon the sun shines again."

He changed his mind overnight, and made it a little more relaxed: "Bored of the rain now."

Not that it appears Chris is missing his former girlfriend.

(Image: Ken McKay/ITV/REX/Shutterstock)

He has recently been discussing how much Jesy Nelson means to him and opened up about their future plans.

Chris, 26, has been dating the singer for nine months now.

He has told of how he sees himself being with the Little Mix star, 28, "forever" - and how he hopes to start a family with her when the time is right.

(Image: Instagram)

The hunk told MailOnline: "At the moment, I see myself being with her forever so eventually we'll want a family.

"But not now as we’re working and are both really busy."

Chris has previously told The Sun:"We both want to get ­married.

(Image: Instagram)

"We found each other and we have endless respect for each other. I think that's why our relationship works. We're proper family people. We love each other's family. I'm ready to settle down and I think she is."

Olivia, 28, and Bradley, 25, have been together on and off for four years, and she had been seeing him before her stint on Love Island, where she met now-ex Chris Hughes.

description: He changed the caption after fans questioned if his remark was about his former girlfriend's big news
